mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, email, pw, name, birth, gender, height, weight, mbti_pk) VALUES ( #{id}, #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{height}, #{weight}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, u.birth, u.gender, u.height, u.weight, m.name AS mbtiName, p.score AS petScore FROM user u LEFT JOIN mbti m ON u.mbti_pk = m.mbti_pk LEFT JOIN pet p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, birth = #{birth}, gender = #{gender}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight} WHERE id = #{id}
